content: समाविश् {c6c} <ab>P.</ab> {@--1@} To enter; <ls>Bk.8. 27</ls>. {@--2@} To go to, approach. {@--3@} To be devoted to, be intent on. {@--4@} To pervade, occupy, fill. {@--5@} To sit down, settle down. {@--6@} To overcome. {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} {@--1@} To cause to enter in, insert. {@--2@} To contain, comprise, hold. {@--3@} To place or fix in or upon. {@--4@} To entrust, assign; <ls>Pt. 1. 85.</ls> {@--5@} To conduct, lead into.
